title: How to Make Baked Pizza Subs

steps.headline: Either make or buy a pizza crust.
Roll it out as if you were making a 12 inch (30.5 cm) pizza.
Add ingredients such as meatballs, cheese, sauce...normal things that you like on a pizza.
Add the toppings to one side and leave an edge (as if it were a crust).
Fold the other half over the side you laid the toppings.
Crimp the edges so that while it is baking, the sub doesn't open up.
Put a sliver in the center so you can cut it easier after it is done baking.
Bake for about 10 to 12 minutes at about 400F.
Remove it from the oven when the sub is golden brown.
Brush on a rub of garlic butter (optional).

text: Either make or buy a pizza crust.  Roll it out as if you were making a 12 inch (30.5 cm) pizza.  Add ingredients such as meatballs, cheese, sauce...normal things that you like on a pizza.  Add the toppings to one side and leave an edge (as if it were a crust).  Fold the other half over the side you laid the toppings.  Crimp the edges so that while it is baking, the sub doesn't open up.  Put a sliver in the center so you can cut it easier after it is done baking.  Bake for about 10 to 12 minutes at about 400F.  Remove it from the oven when the sub is golden brown.  Brush on a rub of garlic butter (optional).  Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.  Use marinara sauce for dipping.  Finished.
